function.name: abs.Expression
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var xmid =O_WORKFLOW.XMMC;
var result=null;
var bean = ABS_LOADBEAN("com.apex.bss.mod.ibb.systemdocking.papers.LinkstecBean");
result = bean.execute(1007, $Login.User.UserID,3,xmid);
var note=result.get('note');
var code=result.get('code');
true;

function.name: lb.Assert
function.arg: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from ecif.lcIB_XMZZLC_GS A,jgcrm.os_wfentry B where A.instid = B.id and B.state in (1,4) and A.xmmc = ? and A.id != ? ",[O_WORKFLOW.XMMC,O_WORKFLOW.ID]) == 0
'同一个项目不允许重复发起该流程！'

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var key;
key=ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT COUNT(1) FROM JGCRM.LBORGANIZATION WHERE ID =? CONNECT BY PRIOR ID = FID START WITH ID = 10016",[$Login.User.OrgID]);
key==0

function.name: abs.ExecSQL
function.arg: ["call ecif.PRO_IB_SENDWFNOTIFY(?,?,{0},{1},2,{2})",[{"expression":"O_WORKFLOW.InstID","scale":"","length":"","type":"1"},{"expression":"<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>\r\nABS_SQLVALUE(\"select REPLACE(to_char(wmsys.wm_concat(userid)),',',';') from lbmember where orgid=? and roleid=6\",[O_WORKFLOW.SQBM])","scale":"","length":"","type":"0"},{"expression":"'-终止流程已提交团队负责人审批'","scale":"","length":"","type":"0"}]]

function.name: abs.Expression
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var s=ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT COUNT(1) FROM JGCRM.OS_CURRENTSTEP T,JGCRM.LBWFCURRENTOWNER A WHERE T.ID = A.STEPID AND T.ENTRY_ID = ? AND T.STEP_ID = 23 AND A.OWNER = ?",[O_WORKFLOW.InstID,$Login.User]);
if (s>0){
LB_workAction("lcIB_XMZZLC_GS",O_WORKFLOW.ID,24,"");
ABS_flushObjCache('WORKFLOW.TASK')
}

step.name: 质控部主副审出具审核意见

function.name: abs.ExecSQL
function.arg: ["call ecif.PRO_IB_SENDWFNOTIFY(?,?,{0},{1},2,{2})",[{"expression":"O_WORKFLOW.InstID","scale":"","length":"","type":"1"},{"expression":"<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>\r\nABS_SQLVALUE(\"select REPLACE(to_char(wmsys.wm_concat(userid)),',',';') from lbmember where orgid=13836 and roleid=4\")","scale":"","length":"","type":"0"},{"expression":"'-终止项目审批已提交质控部负责人审批'","scale":"","length":"","type":"0"}]]

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var cnt1 = ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from jgcrm.lborganization where fid = 1 and id = 13929 start with id = ?  connect by prior fid = id",[O_WORKFLOW.SQR.OrgID]);
cnt1 == 1

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var cnt1 = ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from jgcrm.lborganization where fid = 1 and id = 10015 start with id = ?  connect by prior fid = id",[O_WORKFLOW.SQR.OrgID]);
cnt1 == 1

step.name: 投资银行总部总经理审批

function.name: abs.ExecSQL
function.arg: ["call ecif.PRO_IB_SENDWFNOTIFY(?,?,{0},{1},2,{2})",[{"expression":"O_WORKFLOW.InstID","scale":"","length":"","type":"1"},{"expression":"<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>\r\nABS_SQLVALUE(\"select REPLACE(to_char(wmsys.wm_concat(userid)),',',';') from lbmember where orgid=? and roleid=6\",[O_WORKFLOW.SQBM])","scale":"","length":"","type":"0"},{"expression":"'-终止流程已提交团队负责人审批'","scale":"","length":"","type":"0"}]]

step.name: 项目组答复质控审批意见

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var key;
key=ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT COUNT(1) FROM JGCRM.LBORGANIZATION WHERE ID =? CONNECT BY PRIOR ID = FID START WITH ID = 10016",[$Login.User.OrgID]);
key==0

function.name: abs.ExecSQL
function.arg: ["UPDATE ECIF.TIB_XMXX SET SFRZZK=1,RZZKSJ = TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')) WHERE ID ={0} ",[{"expression":"O_WORKFLOW.XMMC.XMMC","scale":"","length":"","type":"1"}]]

function.name: abs.ExecSQL
function.arg: ["call ecif.PRO_IB_SENDWFNOTIFY(?,?,{0},{1},2,{2})",[{"expression":"O_WORKFLOW.InstID","scale":"","length":"","type":"0"},{"expression":"<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>\r\nABS_SQLVALUE(\"select REPLACE(to_char(wmsys.wm_concat(userid)),',',';') from lbmember where orgid=10016 and roleid=138\")","scale":"","length":"","type":"0"},{"expression":"'-项目终止审批流程已审批完成'","scale":"","length":"","type":"0"}]]

step.name: 并购融资部总经理审批

function.name: abs.Expression
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var s=ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT COUNT(1) FROM JGCRM.OS_CURRENTSTEP T,JGCRM.LBWFCURRENTOWNER A WHERE T.ID = A.STEPID AND T.ENTRY_ID = ? AND T.STEP_ID = 79 AND A.OWNER = ?",[O_WORKFLOW.InstID,$Login.User]);
if (s>0){
LB_workAction("lcIB_XMZZLC_GS",O_WORKFLOW.ID,80,"");
ABS_flushObjCache('WORKFLOW.TASK')
}

function.name: abs.ExecSQL
function.arg: ["call ecif.PRO_IB_SENDWFNOTIFY(?,?,{0},{1},2,{2})",[{"expression":"O_WORKFLOW.InstID","scale":"","length":"","type":"1"},{"expression":"<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>\r\nABS_SQLVALUE(\"select REPLACE(to_char(wmsys.wm_concat(userid)),',',';') from lbmember where orgid=? and roleid=6\",[O_WORKFLOW.SQBM])","scale":"","length":"","type":"0"},{"expression":"'-终止流程已提交团队负责人审批'","scale":"","length":"","type":"0"}]]
